records.text: This doesn't work for my uncle: by the time he is in enough pain to realize he needs it, his cognition is too impaired by the pain to remember to ask. I watched this play out repeatedly over several days.Since the rehab is too understaffed to be able to check in with my uncle regularly about his pain, I made them switch him to scheduled pain meds instead of "as needed." That's not ideal, but it's better than the repeated bouts of severe pain he was experiencing.🧵 3/4
